text: Grenoble School of Management is a European higher studies establishment. The school is in 2 places, in Grenoble and in Paris. It has been created in 1984. Loïk Roche prend la tête de Grenoble École de Management. GEM is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management. European Business School Rankings 2015 ==References== == Further reading == * Official Category:Education in France Category:Grenoble
title: Grenoble School of Management
